poem:
Title: In the Mirror of Melody

In the unlit theater of time,
A young songbird assumes the notes of another.
Selena, born of digital age,
Borrowing the vinyl voice of Linda.
A picture-show waltz, spinning silver screen,
James and John as puppeteers,
Weaving stories from the stranded strings
Of a tune once clear.
One song echoes another,
In the resounding hall of forever.
